summary: Frontend testing completed for Maestro Habitat web app. All major features working correctly. Fixed 1 translation bug in My Kids page.
passed_tests: Login flow with testuser@maestro.com / TestPass123! - SUCCESS
Home page loads with welcome message 'Welcome back, Test!' and navigation cards
Bottom navigation visible with 5 items: Home, Search, Bookings, My Kids, Account
Search page shows 11 coach cards with category pills, ratings (4.8, 4.5), sessions count (235, 217)
Coach detail page loads with profile info, bio, available slots, and Book Session button
Bookings page shows 4 tabs: Upcoming, Rescheduled, Completed, Cancelled - all translated
Profile/Account page shows user info (Test User - Parent/Guardian), appearance toggle, 16 menu items
Profile page has Support section with Contact Us, Help Center, Language
Logout button visible on Profile page
My Kids page loads with proper translations after fix
All text/labels properly translated (no missing translation keys)

bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added 'no_kids_title' and 'no_kids_message' keys to pages.kids section
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: My Kids page empty state was showing raw translation keys instead of translated text

context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend pages tested and working. Translation fix applied to My Kids page. Bottom nav uses data-testid='nav-item-{id}' pattern. Coach detail page uses /tutor/{id} route. All 5 bugs mentioned by main agent have been verified as fixed.
